headline: Is Simon Property Group (SPG) Still Attractive After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Simon Property Group is still reasonably priced at its current level, this article walks through the key numbers so you can judge the value for yourself. The stock last closed at US$189.42, with returns of 2.6% over the past 7 days, 3.0% over the past month, 3.0% year to date, 14.8% over 1 year, 76.9% over 3 years and 141.0% over 5 years. headline: Transforming the Future of Luxury Retail: Simon® Announces Major Redevelopments in Nashville, Denver & Tampa
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced an over $250 million investment program to further elevate three prestigious assets in its portfolio: The Mall at Green Hills in Nashville, Cherry Creek Shopping Center in Denver, and International Plaza in Tampa.
